name: XPInstaller for 3rd Party Apps
short_description: XPInstaller for 3rd Party Apps is a project with the dual goals of keeping the Mac version of Mozilla's XPInstall stub application installer alive, plus promoting XPInstall as a deployment tool for all platforms XPInstall is available for, including OSX
